Brownfield land

View the data

Explore the brownfield land data on this page, which has been collected and processed by the Digital Land pipeline.

URL of the register:
https://www.northumberland.gov.uk/NorthumberlandCountyCouncil/media/Planning-and-Building/planning%20policy/Studies%20and%20Evidence%20Reports/Housing%20Studies/7.%20Brownfield/Northumberland-Brownfield-Land-Register-December-2018.csv
Published 14 December 2019
Last collected on 21 December 2020
From:
Northumberland County Council

How we've processed this data

The Digital Land pipeline collects the data and fixes common errors that do not align with the data standard.

Related content

  • Brownfield land data standard
  • Brownfield land register regulations (2017)

Facts from the data

The following information has been extracted from the register.

The register references 1 organisation.

It reports 164 brownfield sites. 0 of these have an end date and are no longer considered brownfield land.

Not including sites with an end date, there are:

  • 216.47 hectares of brownfield land
  • 3761 potential dwellings that could be built
  • 0 sites have permission in principle

Click on each plotted site to see further information.
